name: Baby Monitor
description:
Progressive Web App that should runs on an old phone placed in the room with a sleeping baby and enough juice for _Screen Wake Lock API_.

Once the microphone has a signal and the calculated decibel — via the **Web Audio API** analyser — reaches the given level several times, the app calls a specified phone number via the [Twilio API](https://www.twilio.com/docs/voice).

name: Depth
description:
Prototyping a web-app that shares a viewport between 2D web pages and a 3D background scene for easy idea prototyping, a personal playground platform.

Contains many separated pages for different purposes, like implementing _Tensorflow APIs_, commanding _WebGL_ with reactivity, etcetera.

name: 1_accustic
description: A short CSS animation without any script backing is unusal among NFTs, but its "cyber" theme and demanding system requirements target the time ahead. It's current goal fulfilled namely successfuly minted on a **blockchain**.

name: serfozoiroda.hu
description: My brother’s office website — in the Hungarian language — with common components: various info pages, embedded _OpenStreetMap_ navigation, contact form with its host compatible _PHPMailer_ prepared for both _UTF-8_ and _Latin-2_ messages using the free tier from _Google SMTP_. Even though it’s a _SPA_, all pages are pre-generated locally _(SSG)_ and uploaded via _SFTP_. The end result is very similar to my first web pages from the early ’90s, immediately it got the maximum _Lighthouse_ performance score.

name: Vite Plugin Pug
description:
Extend _Vite_ build tool with _Pug_ template support for _Vanilla JS_ development. Big frameworks are supporting Pug out of the box thereby using this plugin in most cases is superfluous.

There is a non-stable version that is not in the NPM registry yet that supports hot-module replacement using the **X-Tree Diff+** algorithm for change detection.

name: CSS Tetris 3D
description: CSS 3D perspective experiment that implies the _Tetris_ game. _Tetromino_ aka block movement is implemented with Z-axis rotation.

name: My Repos Action
description: [GitHub Action](https://github.com/features/actions) that tetrieve your fresh and buried public project list via [GitHub GraphQL API](https://docs.github.com/en/graphql/overview/explorer) and populate this list in reverse-chronological order on your GitHub profile page.

name: Time Passing Lambda Image
description: [Netlify Lambda](https://docs.netlify.com/functions/overview/) that calculates the distance from a given date and now in formatted "time ago" words. This **serverless function** returns an embeddable PNG image in base64 encoded binary format.

name: A-Frame Warpspeed Texture
description:
_A-Frame ECS_ (Entity-Component System) texture component that sets real-time calculated animation and is still usable as a texture on any material without blocking the main thread, even I let it tweak until significant FPS drop for (assuming) any desktop or mobile. For its demonstration turn on `useWorker` on the demo page GUI.

To reach this goal the renderer moved to a worker thread and transferred control to an _OffscreenCanvas_. This technology is still experimental and rarely supported by browsers but shows how easy it will be to gain performance without significant code refactors.

name: Flow of Four
description: For JS13K gamejam.

name: Web Words
description:
Browser plugin that imports the entire saved dictionary from _Google Translate_ and shows the translated words on a tooltip on the webpage.

_(On hold until `manifest v3` update.)_

name: WAAπSynth
description:
_Web Audio API_ synthesizer. Able to generate synthetic sound with one or more oscillators and can connect various audio nodes in a graph until the master output. These created sounds are playable with a rudimentary sequencer. All audio calculations are happening in _Worklet_ threads.

Its early version even used _React_ components as audio nodes but the audio timing was inaccurate and even a few milliseconds mismatch is fatal in dance music. Working and filtering with high sample rates is probably better with precompiled code, like _Rust_ to _WebAssembly_.

name: Twitter Bot
description: Classic _Twitter_ follower/unfollower bot that prepared for automatised workflow. Blacklist its reached users to prevent user annoyance caused by the limitless interruption. The legal status of this kind of bot is not clarified to me however I made it as a replacement, for the good.

name: Depend On
description: Iterate through an NPM package tree from a given start point, using an asynchronous generator. using the same semantic versioning `semver` script as the registry for better compatibility.

name: Chat Bot
description: Discord chatbot using Dialogflow agent.

name: JSON City
description: JSON formatter.

name: Whirled on the Spirit Spiral
description: For JS13K gamejam.

name: Road Pump
description: For Ludum Dare 41 gamejam.

name: SQLite Manager
description: SQLite plugin for Unity3D.

name: The Hunger Maims
description: For Ludum Dare 40 gamejam.

name: While Fly
description: Mobile game.

name: PersistData
description: Persistent store data at runtime in Unity3D. Hashmap behind the scenes, accept any kind of types. Singleton, keep data alive between scenes.

name: Help to Find Cats
description: For Global Archiact Jam.

name: PHP Cron
description: This script is able to execute scripts, like crontab. But more often.

name: GIF Animation Preview
description: _WordPress_ plugin that finds every GIF animation in a post and replaces it with an auto-generated preview image from the first frame of the animation and saves it to the post’s media directory. Tweakable smooth effect between the preview and animation while lazy loading big animation data on mobiles.

name: Modell
description: A PHP class for easily create/update/load database entries.

name: FacePlayer
description: Music player that retreive posted musics from Facebook groups and organised them into playlists.
